root.title: Introduction
root.module:
Nebula is a web application that is SCORM 1.2 compliant for use in online learning platforms such as Moodle. Nebula is an HTML5 application and is optimised for use on desktop, laptop, and tablets.

Nebula has been developed to comply with WCAG AA standards (assuming alternative media has been supplied).
root.learn_about: This is a demo module show casing the variety of page types and interactions available in Nebula. There are many configuration options available making it a flexible tool to build an online learning module. Nebula also has a theme builder so you can choose colors, fonts and other graphical features.
root.get_started: View the help section for tips on how to navigate the module.
root.text_references: Check the Resources panel for references
